1: %%%===================================================================
    2: %%% @copyright (C) 2012, Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%% @doc Suite for testing s2s connection
    4: %%% @end
    5: %%%===================================================================
    6: 
    7: -module(s2s_SUITE).
    8: -compile(export_all).
    9: 
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   12: 
   13: -record(s2s_opts, {
   14:           node1_s2s_certfile = undefined,
   15:           node1_s2s_use_starttls = undefined,
   16:           node2_s2s_certfile = undefined,
   17:           node2_s2s_use_starttls = undefined
   18:          }).
   19: 
   20: 
   21: %%%===================================================================
   22: %%% Suite configuration
   23: %%%===================================================================
   24: 
   25: all() ->
   26:     [
   27:      {group, both_plain},
   28:      {group, both_tls_optional}, %% default MongooseIM config
   29:      {group, both_tls_required},
   30: 
   31:      {group, node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required},
   32:      {group, node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional},
   33: 
   34:      {group, node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional},
   35: 
   36:      {group, node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional},
   37:      {group, node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false},
   38: 
   39:      {group, node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required},
   40:      {group, node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false}
   41: 
   42:     ].
   43: 
   44: groups() ->
   45:     [{both_plain, [sequence], all_tests()},
   46:      {both_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   47:      {both_tls_required, [], essentials()},
   48: 
   49:      {node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required, [], essentials()},
   50:      {node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   51: 
   52:      %% Node1 closes connection with "self-signed certificate" reason
   53:      {node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional, [], negative()},
   54: 
   55:      {node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional, [], essentials()},
   56:      {node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false, [], essentials()},
   57: 
   58:      {node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required, [], negative()},
   59:      {node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false, [], negative()}
   60:     ].
   61: 
   62: essentials() ->
   63:     [simple_message].
   64: 
   65: all_tests() ->
   66:     essentials() ++ [nonexistent_user, unknown_domain].
   67: 
   68: negative() ->
   69:     [timeout_waiting_for_message].
   70: 
   71: suite() ->
   72:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}|escalus:suite()].
   73: 
   74: %%%===================================================================
   75: %%% Init & teardown
   76: %%%===================================================================
   77: 
   78: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   79:     Node1S2SCertfile = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_certfile]),
   80:     Node1S2SUseStartTLS = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls]),
   81: 
   82:     node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, start, [[ejabberd]]),
   83: 
   84:     Node2S2SCertfile = node2_rpccall(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_certfile]),
   85:     Node2S2SUseStartTLS = node2_rpccall(ejabberd_config, get_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls]),
   86:     S2S = #s2s_opts{node1_s2s_certfile = Node1S2SCertfile,
   87:                     node1_s2s_use_starttls = Node1S2SUseStartTLS,
   88:                     node2_s2s_certfile = Node2S2SCertfile,
   89:                     node2_s2s_use_starttls = Node2S2SUseStartTLS},
   90: 
   91:     Config1 = [{s2s_opts, S2S} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config0)],
   92:     escalus_users:create_users(Config1, {by_name, [alice2, bob2, alice, bob]}).
   93: 
   94: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   95:     S2SOrig = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
   96:     configure_s2s(S2SOrig),
   97:     node2_rpccall(mongoose_cover_helper, analyze, []),
   98:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}),
   99:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
  100: 
  101: init_per_group(both_plain, Config) ->
  102:     configure_s2s(#s2s_opts{}),
  103:     Config;
  104: init_per_group(both_tls_optional, Config) ->
  105:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config), %The initial config assumes that both nodes are configured to use encrypted s2s
  106:     configure_s2s(S2S),
  107:     Config;
  108: init_per_group(both_tls_required, Config) ->
  109:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  110:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required,
  111:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  112:     Config;
  113: init_per_group(node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_required, Config) ->
  114:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  115:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  116:     Config;
  117: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  118:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  119:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  120:     Config;
  121: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_trusted_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  122:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  123:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required_trusted}),
  124:     Config;
  125: init_per_group(node1_tls_false_node2_tls_optional, Config) ->
  126:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  127:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  128:     Config;
  129: init_per_group(node1_tls_optional_node2_tls_false, Config) ->
  130:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  131:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node2_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  132:     Config;
  133: init_per_group(node1_tls_false_node2_tls_required, Config) ->
  134:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  135:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = false,
  136:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = required}),
  137:     Config;
  138: init_per_group(node1_tls_required_node2_tls_false, Config) ->
  139:     S2S = ?config(s2s_opts, Config),
  140:     configure_s2s(S2S#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_use_starttls = required,
  141:                                node2_s2s_use_starttls = false}),
  142:     Config;
  143: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  144:     Config.
  145: 
  146: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  150:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  151: 
  152: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  153:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  154: 
  155: %%%===================================================================
  156: %%% Server-to-server communication test
  157: %%%===================================================================
  158: 
  159: simple_message(Config) ->
  160:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice2, 1}, {alice, 1}], fun(Alice2, Alice1) ->
  161: 
  162:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Alice@localhost2
  163:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice2, <<"Hi, foreign Alice!">>)),
  164: 
  165:         %% Alice@localhost2 receives message from Alice@localhost1
  166:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2, 10000),
  167:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, foreign Alice!">>], Stanza),
  168: 
  169:         %% Alice@localhost2 sends message to Alice@localhost1
  170:         escalus:send(Alice2, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice1, <<"Nice to meet you!">>)),
  171: 
  172:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives message from Alice@localhost2
  173:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1, 10000),
  174:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Nice to meet you!">>], Stanza2)
  175: 
  176:     end).
  177: 
  178: timeout_waiting_for_message(Config) ->
  179:     try
  180:         simple_message(Config),
  181:         ct:fail("got message but shouldn't")
  182:     catch
  183:         error:timeout_when_waiting_for_stanza ->
  184:             ok
  185:     end.
  186: 
  187: nonexistent_user(Config) ->
  188:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {alice2, 1}], fun(Alice1, Alice2) ->
  189: 
  190:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Xyz@localhost2
  191:         RemoteServer = escalus_client:server(Alice2),
  192:         Fake = <<"xyz@", RemoteServer/binary>>,
  193:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Fake,
  194:                                                     <<"Hello, nonexistent!">>)),
  195: 
  196:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives stanza error: service-unavailable
  197:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  198:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"service-unavailable">>], Stanza)
  199: 
  200:     end).
  201: 
  202: unknown_domain(Config) ->
  203:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice1) ->
  204: 
  205:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Xyz@localhost3
  206:         escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:chat_to(
  207:             <<"xyz@somebogushost">>,
  208:             <<"Hello, unreachable!">>)),
  209: 
  210:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives stanza error: remote-server-not-found
  211:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1, 10000),
  212:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"remote-server-not-found">>], Stanza)
  213: 
  214:     end).
  215: 
  216: nonascii_addr(Config) ->
  217:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob2, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  218: 
  219:         %% Bob@localhost2 sends message to Alice@localhost1
  220:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Cześć Alice!">>)),
  221: 
  222:         %% Alice@localhost1 receives message from Bob@localhost2
  223:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 10000),
  224:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Cześć Alice!">>], Stanza),
  225: 
  226:         %% Alice@localhost1 sends message to Bob@localhost2
  227:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Miło Cię poznać">>)),
  228: 
  229:         %% Bob@localhost2 receives message from Alice@localhost1
  230:         Stanza2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 10000),
  231:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Miło Cię poznać">>], Stanza2)
  232: 
  233:     end).
  234: 
  235: node2_rpccall(Module, Function, Args) ->
  236:     Node = ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node),
  237:     rpc:call(Node, Module, Function, Args).
  238: 
  239: configure_s2s(#s2s_opts{node1_s2s_certfile = Certfile1,
  240:                         node1_s2s_use_starttls = StartTLS1,
  241:                         node2_s2s_certfile = Certfile2,
  242:                         node2_s2s_use_starttls = StartTLS2}) ->
  243:     configure_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd_node), Certfile1, StartTLS1),
  244:     configure_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node), Certfile2, StartTLS2),
  245:     restart_s2s().
  246: 
  247: configure_s2s(Node, Certfile, StartTLS) ->
  248:     rpc:call(Node, ejabberd_config, add_local_option, [s2s_certfile, Certfile]),
  249:     rpc:call(Node, ejabberd_config, add_local_option, [s2s_use_starttls, StartTLS]).
  250: 
  251: restart_s2s() ->
  252:     restart_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd_node)),
  253:     restart_s2s(ct:get_config(ejabberd2_node)).
  254: 
  255: 
  256: restart_s2s(Node) ->
  257:     Children = rpc:call(Node, supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_s2s_out_sup]),
  258:     [rpc:call(Node, ejabberd_s2s_out, stop_connection, [Pid]) ||
  259:      {_, Pid, _, _} <- Children],
  260: 
  261:     ChildrenIn = rpc:call(Node, supervisor, which_children, [ejabberd_s2s_in_sup]),
  262:     [rpc:call(Node, erlang, exit, [Pid, kill]) ||
  263:      {_, Pid, _, _} <- ChildrenIn].
  264:
